exceptions.tactic: exists (sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => a k * x ^ k) n + x ^ S n * s).
exceptions.exn: In environment a : nat -> R n : nat x : R s : R_NormedModule The term "sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => a k * x ^ k) n + x ^ S n * s" has type "R" while it is expected to have type "posreal".
The reference Hs2 was not found in the current environment.
Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

original: intros a n x H. unfold ex_pseries, PSeries in H. unfold ex_series, Series in H. unfold PS_decr_n. destruct H as [s [Hs1 Hs2]]. exists (sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => a k * x ^ k) n + x ^ S n * s). rewrite Hs2. reflexivity.
